lexeme ---------- token

for ---------- identifier
i ---------- identifier
in ---------- identifier
range ---------- identifier
( ---------- separator
1 ---------- integer
, ---------- separator
6 ---------- integer
) ---------- separator
: ---------- separator
if ---------- keyword
i ---------- identifier
== ---------- operator
3: ---------- invalid
print('Found ---------- invalid
it!') ---------- invalid
continue ---------- identifier
print ---------- identifier
( ---------- separator
i ---------- identifier
) ---------- separator
def ---------- identifier
factorial ---------- identifier
( ---------- separator
n ---------- identifier
) ---------- separator
: ---------- separator
if ---------- keyword
n ---------- identifier
== ---------- operator
0: ---------- invalid
return ---------- keyword
1 ---------- integer
else: ---------- invalid
return ---------- keyword
n ---------- identifier
* ---------- operator
factorial ---------- identifier
( ---------- separator
n ---------- identifier
- ---------- operator
1 ---------- integer
) ---------- separator
print ---------- identifier
(factorial ---------- invalid
( ---------- separator
5 ---------- integer
)) ---------- invalid
